product_name: Fall to Winter Ready Lawn Kit
description:
Greener fall lawn, weed-free spring

The Fall to Winter Ready Lawn Kit provides everything you need to strengthen your lawn and eliminate weeds for next spring.

This easy and effective kit combines targeted nutrients to feed your fall lawn with iron-powered weed killer for broadleaf fall weeds. Formulated specifically for fall lawns, it repairs and prevents lawn damage, promoting deep root growth and extended greening into the cooler months.

Sunday is dedicated to creating eco-conscious, effective lawn care solutions that nurture your yard and the world around it.

Kits Benefits

Kits Components

sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
Apply before mid-October when temperatures range between 50°F and 85°F, typically in the early morning or evening.
If you miss an application and have leftover product, save it for next season!
What weeds does Dandelion Doom control?
Dandelion Doom effectively targets common broadleaf weeds like dandelions, clovers, chickweed, thistle, creeping charlie, and more. It also controls moss, algae, lichens, and suppresses common lawn diseases like dollar spot, rust and snow mold.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes! This kit complements other Sunday lawn and garden products. Allow recommended dry time between liquid applications for best results.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on the lawn after applying the kit?
It's safe to return to the lawn after the liquid fertilizers and weed control products have dried.
When will I see results?
Fertilizer: Results are typically visible within hours to days, providing 4-6 weeks of greening and growth.
Weed control: Weed control results can be seen in a few hours to a few days. Larger or tough to kill weeds may require multiple applications.
